title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Whisk eggs with cheese and pepper.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in the egg mixture quickly and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate the chicken in tikka paste for 1 hour.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato puree and simmer for 20 minutes.
Stir in cream and serve with rice.
